## Quick Start

1. Click "Use this template" above
2. Clone your repository
3. Edit `.qmd` files and customize `_quarto.yml`
4. View at: `https://YOUR-USERNAME.github.io/YOUR-REPO/`

## Workflows

- **publish.yml** - Builds and deploys to GitHub Pages
- **preview.yml** - Creates PR previews with highlighted changes
- **check-spelling.yaml** - Spell checking
- **lint-project.yaml** - R code linting
- **copilot-setup-steps.yml** - GitHub Copilot environment setup
- **summary.yml** - AI-powered issue summaries
